Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
hexogithubgithub[](http://igeek.wang/2016/09/01/automatic-backup/#more)

<!-- more -->

### Hexo
* Githubrepohexo-next-bloghexo
```sh
git init
```

* ()
```sh
git remote add origin git@github:XXX/hexo-next-blog.git
git pull origin master
```

* .gitignore*.log, public/  deploy*/;
* Hexo
```sh
git add .
git commit -m "hexo next blog"
```

* github:
```sh
git push origin master
```

### Hexo
nodegitgithub sshkey
hexoclone githubrepo
```sh
git clone git@github.com:xxx/hexo-next-blog.git
```
git clonehexo:
```sh
npm install hexo
npm install -g hexo-cli
npm install hexo-server --save    # hexo s
npm install                       #  hexo-next-blog/source/_postsnpm install404
npm install hexo-deployer-git
npm install --save shelljs   # hexo d
```

themes/next.git

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!--more -->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

---
title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).
<!--more -->
## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: C
Post._content:
```C
#define COMM_BIT_SET(a,b)     ((a) |= (1<<(b)))   //  a  b 11b
#define COMM_BIT_CLR(a,b)     ((a) &= ~(1<<(b)))  //  a  b 
#define COMM_BIT_GET(a,b)     (!!((a) & (1<<(b)))) //  ab1 !!01
```
<!-- more -->
COMM_BIT_SETCOMM_BIT_GET

```C
enum {
  TEST1 = 1,
  TEST2 = 2,
};

int i = 0;
COMM_BIT_SET(i, TEST1);
cout<< COMM_BIT_GET(i, TEST1) <<endl;  // true
cout<< COMM_BIT_GET(i, TEST2) <<endl;  // false

COMM_BIT_SET(i, TEST2);
cout<< COMM_BIT_GET(i, TEST1) <<endl;  // false
cout<< COMM_BIT_GET(i, TEST2) <<endl;  // true

```
[](http://imhuchao.com/423.html)

#define COMM_BIT_CLR(a,b)     ((a) &= ~(1<<(b)))  //  a  b 
#define COMM_BIT_GET(a,b)     (!!((a) & (1<<(b)))) //  ab1 !!01

Post.content: windows

Post._content:
<!--more -->


```C++
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

class CStatic
{
public:
    static void Print()
    {
        cout<<m_iTest<<endl;
    }
private:
    static int m_iTest; //
};

int CStatic::m_iTest = 0; //  int CStatic::m_iTest; 

int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
    CStatic cs;
    cs.Print();
    return 0;
}
```


****[](http://www.cnblogs.com/rickyk/p/4238380.html)

```C++
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

class CStatic
{
public:
    CStatic()
    {
        m_iTest = 0;
        s_pInstance = this;   // 
    }
    static void Print()
    {
        s_pInstance->m_iTest += 1;  //
        cout<<s_pInstance->m_iTest<<endl;
    }
private:
    int m_iTest;
    static CStatic* s_pInstance;
};
CStatic* CStatic::s_pInstance = NULL ;
int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
    CStatic cs;   // thisc
    cs.Print();
    CStatic cs1;
    return 0;
}

```
